title: WIN: Tickets to CITR Live #002 – LAW, PHORIA, PALE, FUNK ETHICS
content:
With our second live showcase just around the corner, we thought we’d give any of you who haven’t bought a ticket yet the chance to win a pair!

This month we’re back at the Bussey Building in Peckham pairing a different visual artist with each musician, expect to be bombarded by friendly people, kaleidoscopic visuals and exciting music.

TO WIN

All you have to do to enter is follow @CrackInTheRoad on twitter and then retweet our competition tweet here. Good luck!

Follow @crackintheroad

You can get a taste of what CitR LIVE entails from the video of last month’s event below.

Check out this month’s acts below, side by side with the visual artists we’ve paired them with.

Facebook event: https://on.fb.me/12SSFlE

LAW (Debut London Show) – PAULINE NADAL
PHORIA – CHARLOTTE COUSINS
PALE – WILL KENDRICK
FUNK ETHICS – JOE EVANS

RESIDENT DJs

EDMONDSON
MATT GREIG
MUTE

9.00-LATE
£5

BUSSEY BUILDING: PECKHAM

18+
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d40
